alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Northern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued February 25 at 2:08AM MST until February 25 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility less than one mile in freezing fog. * WHERE...Northern and central Lea County and the central Permian Basin in West Texas. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility and potential frost on bridges.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Also, be alert for frost on bridge decks causing slippery roads.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Northern Lea County
